lblMainInfo: WLED devices are discovered automatically via mDNS. If auto-discovery fails, you can manually add devices by IP address.
hlpTimeSync: Interval in seconds between device status updates
hlpMaxRetries: Maximum number of connection retry attempts before marking device as offline
hlpRetryBackoff: Use exponential backoff strategy for connection retries
lblDevicesInfo: Manage your WLED devices. Devices are automatically discovered, or you can add them manually.

cnfDeleteDeviceText: Are you sure you want to delete this device? All associated states and objects will be permanently removed.
